lifecycle.usageRule: Implement Breadcrumb from PDF contract first. If docs/rules/spec conflict, PDF wins.
lifecycle.migrationTrigger: Sync local docs/rules/spec whenever breadcrumb.pdf changes.

breadcrumb.description: Breadcrumb shows current location hierarchy and allows step-back navigation.

canonicalTerminology.rule: Use canonical names in docs/rules/contracts; avoid alternate labels.

structure.currentItemRule: Last item is current page and is not interactive.

interaction.clickableItems: All previous hierarchy items are interactive links/buttons.
interaction.currentItem: Current location is read-only text with aria-current='page'.
interaction.keyboard: Tab navigation only through interactive breadcrumb items.
interaction.overflow: Collapse middle segments with ellipsis when space is insufficient.

responsive.rule: On narrow widths, preserve first and last levels and collapse middle levels first.
responsive.ellipsisRule: Collapsed segment can expand via menu/popover when requested by product flow.

blockingRules: If hierarchy/current item semantics cannot be satisfied, return BLOCKER.
If interactive breadcrumb states are missing, return FAIL.
Do not make current page item clickable.
